town_areas.Speed dating house: The house for the group speed dating event, with a long table.

scenario_description: You are participating in a group speed dating event, with 4 men and 4 women in total. In each round, you have 5 minutes to talk to another candidate, including a 2-min introduction and a 3-min free chat. Try to decide how much you like in this process and also make an impression of your self on others.
